Specimen Type: Bone marrow aspirate, peripheral blood, lymph node/tissue single-cell suspension
Purpose: To characterize cell surface and intracellular markers for the diagnosis and classification of suspected leukemia or lymphoma cases.
Container: EDTA tube (blood), heparinized syringe or EDTA tube (bone marrow)
Equipment: Flow cytometer (e.g., BD FACSCanto or equivalent), vortex mixer, centrifuge
